what: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
title: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
text: goal mapmaryland ease access spatial data Maryland local, regional, statewide level.

title: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
text: can install development version mapmaryland like :

title: Easy Access to Maryland Spatial Data
text: Currently, package limited number data access functions, prepackaged datasets, reference data index Maryland ArcGIS services.
code: library(mapmaryland) dplyr::glimpse(md_arcgis_index) #> Rows: 78 #> Columns: 13 #> $ name         <chr> NA, NA, NA, "Baltimore City DPW", "Baltimore City DOT", N… #> $ operator.abb <chr> NA, NA, NA, "DPW", "DOT", "BCIT", NA, "BCIT", "BCIT", "BC… #> $ operator     <chr> NA, NA, NA, "Department of Public Works", NA, "Baltimore … #> $ city         <chr> NA, NA, NA, "Baltimore", "Baltimore", "Baltimore", "Balti… #> $ county       <chr> "Allegany County", "Anne Arundel County", "Anne Arundel C… #> $ state        <chr> "Maryland", "Maryland", "Maryland", "Maryland", "Maryland… #> $ state.abb    <chr> "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD", "MD… #> $ geography    <chr> "countywide", "countywide", "countywide", "citywide", "ci… #> $ source_type  <chr> "county government", "county government", "county governm… #> $ notes        <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, "Used for Baltimore City CoDe… #> $ public       <lgl> TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRU… #> $ services_url <chr> "https://alleganygis.allconet.org/allcogis/rest/services"… #> $ hosting      <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, "ArcGIS Online", … location <-   get_md_tigris(     name = "Hyattsville",     type = "census places"   )  location #> Simple feature collection with 1 feature and 17 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -8568784 ymin: 4713631 xmax: -8564592 ymax: 4719546 #> Projected CRS: WGS 84 / Pseudo-Mercator #>    statefp countyfp placefp  placens   geoid        name         namelsad lsad #> 90      24      033   41250 02390603 2441250 Hyattsville Hyattsville city   25 #>    classfp pcicbsa mtfcc funcstat   aland awater    intptlat     intptlon #> 90      C1       N G4110        A 7005779  68516 +38.9612045 -076.9549346 #>                    county                       geometry #> 90 Prince George's County MULTIPOLYGON (((-8568783 47... streams <-   get_water_data(     location = location,     type = "streams"   ) #> ✔ Downloading "Rivers and Streams - Generalized" from #>   <https://geodata.md.gov/imap/rest/services/Hydrology/MD_Waterbodies/FeatureServer/0> #> Layer type: "Feature Layer" #>  #> Geometry type: "esriGeometryPolyline" #>  #> Service Coordinate Reference System: "EPSG:3857" #>  #> Output Coordinate Reference System: "EPSG:4326"  plot(streams, max.plot = 1)

what: Cache data from Maryland iMap — cache_imap_data
title: Cache data from Maryland iMap — cache_imap_data
text: cache_imap_data() wrapper get_imap_data() getdata::cache_location_data() save layer Maryland iMap subset layer local file. default, data saved mapmaryland package cache folder.

title: Cache data from Maryland iMap — cache_imap_data
code: cache_imap_data(   data = NULL,   nm = NULL,   ...,   location = NULL,   name = NULL,   label = NULL,   fileext = "gpkg",   filename = NULL,   path = NULL,   prefix = NULL,   postfix = NULL,   cache = TRUE,   pkg = "getdata",   create = TRUE,   overwrite = FALSE,   call = caller_env() )

title: Cache data from Maryland iMap — cache_imap_data
text: data Data pass getdata::bind_block_col(). format_parcel_data() . nm Layer name identifier used retrieve url md_imap_index based snakecase "nm" column; Default: NULL. ... Additional parameters passed getdata::get_esri_data() location sf, sfc, bbox object (object convertible sfext::as_bbox(). Required. name Name make file name converted snake case janitor::make_clean_names(), e.g. "Residential zoning map" becomes "residential_zoning_map". name includes file extension assumed filename provided name parameter. label Label combine name converted snake case janitor::make_clean_names(). label designed identify area shared characteristics across multiple data files, maps, plots. label ignored name NULL name includes file extension. fileext File type extension. Optional filename path include file extension. filename File name; filename NULL path include file extension, name file extension required. path Path file data directory. Optional. path includes file extension filename fileext NULL, filename extension included path used instead. multiple file extensions provided filename, path, fileext, make_filename() abort. prefix File name prefix. "date" adds date prefix, "time" adds date/time prefix; defaults NULL. postfix File name postfix; defaults NULL. cache TRUE, path set package cache directory using get_data_dir(); defaults FALSE. pkg Package name passed appname parameter rappdirs::user_cache_dir() create FALSE path exist, return path warning. TRUE rlang::is_interactive() TRUE, ask user directory created. session interactive create TRUE, new directory created. overwrite TRUE, remove file name path call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

what: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
text: Convert coordinate reference system, convert invalid geometry valid geometry sf::st_make_valid(), , optionally, erase water, clean names janitor::clean_names().

title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
code: format_md_sf(   data,   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   erase_water = FALSE,   erase_data = NULL,   clean_names = TRUE,   dTolerance = NULL,   smooth = FALSE,   sf_col = "geometry",   ... )

title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
text: data sf object (format_md_crash_data() ) data.frame object. crs coordinate reference system. Defaults getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857). option can set set_mapmaryland_options(). erase_water TRUE, erase geometry intersecting md_water; Default: FALSE. TRUE, erase_data NULL, md_water combined unioned erase_data. erase_data sf, sfc, bbox object geometry erased data, Default: NULL clean_names TRUE, set .name_repair janitor::make_clean_names(); defaults TRUE. dTolerance numeric; tolerance parameter, specified feature geometry. run st_simplify, input data specified long-lat coordinates sf_use_s2() returns TRUE, value dTolerance must specified meters. smooth TRUE, smooth data smoothr::smooth using default method parameters, Default: FALSE. sf_col Name use output sf column, Default: 'geometry'. ... Additional parameters passed format_data

title: Format Maryland simple feature data — format_md_sf
text: modified version input simple feature data.

what: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
text: Get data Maryland iMap including Computer Assisted Mass Appraisal (CAMA), parcel data, Maryland Inventory Historic Properties data, variety water data.

title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
code: get_imap_data(   location = NULL,   nm = NULL,   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_cama_data(   location,   type = "core",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_parcel_data(   location,   type = "boundaries",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   block = FALSE,   ... )  format_parcel_data(   data,   imap_addr_cols = list(bldg_num = "strtnum", street_dir_prefix = "strtdir", street_name     = "strtnam", street_suffix = "strttyp") )  get_mht_data(   location,   type = "mihp",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_water_data(   location,   type = "streams",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   ... )  get_imap_url(nm = NULL)

title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
text: location sf, sfc, bbox object (object convertible sfext::as_bbox(). Required. nm Layer name identifier used retrieve url md_imap_index based snakecase "nm" column; Default: NULL. crs Coordinate reference system return. Defaults getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857). ... Additional parameters passed getdata::get_esri_data() type Default supported options vary function. See details. block block TRUE, pass parcel data getdata::bind_block_col(). Defaults FALSE. data Data pass getdata::bind_block_col(). format_parcel_data() . imap_addr_cols Named list address column names input data. Passed corresponding parameters getdata::bind_block_col()

title: Get data from Maryland iMap — get_imap_data
text: Options type parameter: get_cama_data(): Default: "core"; options: "bldg" (detailed building characteristics), "core", "land", "subarea" (building subarea). get_water_data(): Default: "streams", options: "streams" (Rivers streams generalized), "streams detailed" (Rivers streams generalized), "federal watersheds", "8 digit watersheds", "12 digit watersheds", "navigable waterways", "ponds" (Lakes ponds) get_parcel_data(): Default "boundaries", options: "boundaries" (Parcel boundaries), "points" (Parcel points) get_mht_data(): Default: "mihp"; options: "mihp" (Maryland Inventory Historic Properties), "nr" (National Register Historic Places), "easements" (Preservation Easements held Maryland Historical Trust) Helper functions: format_parcel_data() wrapper getdata::bind_block_col() used get_parcel_data() get_imap_url() look-function md_imap_index using short "nm" column index.

what: Get and format Maryland crash data — get_md_crash_data
title: Get and format Maryland crash data — get_md_crash_data
text: Get crash data using get_md_open_data(). format_md_crash_data works data frame crash data get_md_crash_data() type = "crashes". format_md_crashes_person() formats data type = "persons". format_md_crashes() calls one depending type parameter.

title: Get and format Maryland crash data — get_md_crash_data
code: get_md_crash_data(   location = NULL,   ...,   report_no = NULL,   where = NULL,   type = "crashes" )  format_md_crash_data(data, type = "crashes", drop_code = TRUE, ...)  format_md_crashes(data)  format_md_crash_date(data, cols = c("acc_date", "acc_time"))  format_md_crashes_person(   data,   start_year = 2022,   end_year = 2022,   na_dates = c("1/1/1900", "19000101", "19001111", "19001212", "19200202") )

title: Get and format Maryland crash data — get_md_crash_data
text: location sf sfc object covering location return crash data. ... Passed get_md_open_data() get_md_crash_data() passed specified formatting functions used format_md_crash_data(). report_no Crash report numbers. Defaults NULL. Optionally used filter results type "persons" "vehicles". query parameter passed get_md_open_data() type Supported options include "crashes" (default), "persons" ("crashes_person"), "vehicles" ("crashes_vehicle"). data Data frame Maryland vehicular crash data; typically get_md_crash_data drop_code TRUE (default), drop columns end "code" cols Column names use format_md_crash_date(). start_year, end_year Start end year use checking validity birth dates. na_dates Character vector invalid dates replace NA_character_ value.

title: Get and format Maryland crash data — get_md_crash_data
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ if (interactive()) {   get_md_crash_data(     where = "(year = '2020') AND (quarter = 'Q2')",     name_col = "county_desc",     name = "Cecil"   ) } } # }

what: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
title: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
text: Wrap getdata::get_open_data access Maryland Open Data portal. source url can set option named "mapmaryland.open_data_source_url" defaults statewide open data portal https://opendata.maryland.gov token type can set option named "mapmaryland.open_data_token_type" defaults "MARYLAND_OPEN_DATA_API_KEY".

title: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
code: get_md_open_data(   resource = NULL,   type = NULL,   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   geometry = FALSE,   token = NULL,   ... )

title: Get data from the Maryland Open Data Portal — get_md_open_data
text: resource Resource identifier code passed "data" parameter getdata::get_open_data type Type data return. Supported options: "crashes", "road closures", "bay pollution reduction" crs Coordinate reference system bounding box return; defaults NULL maintains crs input object. geometry TRUE coords provided, return sf object. Default FALSE. token Optional access token API Key pass getdata::set_access_token(). token type variable set getOption("mapmaryland.open_data_token_type", default = "MARYLAND_OPEN_DATA_API_KEY") ... Arguments passed getdata::get_open_data data data set identifier (known resource Socrata) url individual dataset. data set "list" valid source_url provided, function returns list available resources. data url, source_url must NULL. get_socrata_metadata requires data parameter. source_url data source url. Socrata, base url open data portal. source_type Data source type; defaults "socrata" currently supported option. select Names columns return transformed, equivalent SELECT SQL. Passed SODA $select parameter, see https://dev.socrata.com/docs/queries/select.html information. Condition filters rows return, equivalent SQL. Passed SODA $parameter, see https://dev.socrata.com/docs/queries/.html information. query full SoQL query string, one parameter. Passed SODA $query parameter, see https://dev.socrata.com/docs/queries/query.html information. location sf object. multiple areas provided, unioned single sf object using sf::st_union() dist buffer distance units. Optional. diag_ratio ratio diagonal distance area's bounding box used buffer distance. e.g. diagonal distance 3000 meters "diag_ratio = 0.1"  300 meter used. Ignored dist provided. unit Units buffer. Supported options include "meter", "foot", "kilometer", "mile", "nautical mile" Common abbreviations (e.g. "km" instead "kilometer") also supported. Distance units converted units matching GDAL units x; defaults "meter" asp Aspect ratio width height numeric value (e.g. 0.33) character (e.g. "1:3"). numeric, get_asp() returns value without modification. name,name_col Name column Socrata data resource location names (e.g. County) name location return. location_col Name "location" "point" type column Socrata dataset. coords Coordinate columns input data.frame output sf object (geometry 'centroid' 'point') Default: c("lon", "lat"). token,type Access token API Key token type (name used store token .Renvironment). token may required access data Socrata open data portals can stored environment variable set_access_token. from_crs Coordinate reference system used match location CRS source data. clean_names TRUE, clean names provided nm created based value col using janitor::clean_names. FALSE, use names provided. quiet TRUE, suppress messages downloading data. Defaults FALSE. .name_repair One "unique", "universal", "check_unique". See vctrs::vec_as_names() meaning options.

what: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: Get package data Maryland counties, U.S. Congressional District, Census designated places name GeoID use tigris package download state data.

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
code: get_md_tigris(   name = NULL,   type = "counties",   crs = getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857),   erase_water = FALSE,   ... )

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: name Name matching value namelsad, namelsad, geoid columns md_counties, md_census_places, md_congressional_districts, one data sets available download tigris; Default: NULL type Type data return, Default: "counties"; See details supported options. crs coordinate reference system. Defaults getOption("mapmaryland.crs", default = 3857). option can set set_mapmaryland_options(). erase_water TRUE, erase geometry intersecting md_water; Default: FALSE. TRUE, erase_data NULL, md_water combined unioned erase_data. ... Additional parameters passed tigris functions.

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: simple feature object matching type provided.

title: Use package data or the tigris package to get Maryland data from the U.S. Census Bureau — get_md_tigris
text: Use mapmaryland packaged data use tigris U.S. Census Bureau API: Supported options access data included mapmaryland package include "counties", "census places", "congressional districts", "legislative districts", "water". Options access data calling one several tigris functions downloading data U.S. Census Bureau API include "senate district", "tracts", "block groups", "blocks", "pumas", "voting districts", "zctas", "roads", "primary secondary roads", "area water",  "linear water", "landmarks". tigris functions use "state" parameter (e.g. tigris::coastline tigris::rails)  supported function.

title: Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index

title: Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
text: data frame 95 rows 13 variables: name character Source name operator.abb character Operator abbreviation operator character Operator name city character City name county character County name state character State name state.abb character State name abbreviation geography character Geographic scope; Options include citywide, countywide, regional (multi-county), statewide, regional (multistate). source_type character Source type notes character Notes public logical Public data indicator services_url character Services URL hosting character Hosting type; Currently used indicator ArcGIS Online hosted data services assumed self-hosted source operator.

title: Maryland ArcGIS REST API Services Index — md_arcgis_index
text: Comments, additions, corrections can submitted using comments open Google Sheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1c829bZdNqvbpoizulBU_XE5jVeNNck2kHkS-smpQ52s/edit?usp=sharing Data last updated Google Sheet 2024-09-18.

title: Maryland Counties (boundaries) — md_counties
text: County boundaries downloaded U.S. Census Bureau tigris::counties function. Counties Baltimore–Columbia–Towson Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) include Baltimore City, Baltimore County, Carroll County, Anne Arundel County, Howard County, Queen Anne's County, Harford County. Counties DC-VA-MD-WV Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) include Montgomery, Frederick, Prince George's, Charles, Calvert counties. Regions based resource Visit Maryland https://www.visitmaryland.org/info/maryland-regions

what: Maryland K-12 Schools (Public and Charter Schools) — md_schools
title: Maryland K-12 Schools (Public and Charter Schools) — md_schools
text: Combined iMap FeatureLayer traditional public schools charter schools. school number previously included dataset incomplete due iMap data using different school name MSDE data little less half schools state. February 2023, school number column removed ensure data accurate avoid confusion. charter schools, school_type column added based grade range. Data based iMap data layers 2023 February 10 public schools https://geodata.md.gov/imap/rest/services/Education/MD_EducationFacilities/FeatureServer/5 charter schools https://geodata.md.gov/imap/rest/services/Education/MD_EducationFacilities/FeatureServer/6

title: Maryland Public School Enrollment (SY 2003-2022) — msde_enrollment
text: Enrollment data Maryland State Department Education (MSDE). data copied marylandedu R data package. Refer package detailed documentation. Variable definitions based definitions MSDE website.

title: Maryland Public School Enrollment (SY 2003-2022) — msde_enrollment
Maryland Public School Enrollment (SY 2003-2022) — msde_enrollment
text: data frame 219,741 rows 10 variables: year School academic year enrollment count, e.g. 2019 data start 2019-2020 school year. school_number School number integer (0 indicates schools) school_name School name enrolled_count Number students registered attend school start year grade grade range integer. Typically enrollment count September 30. grade Grades Prekindergarden (PK) Grade 12 grade_range elementary school Grades, middle school grades, high school grades, grades (total enrollment). May also used label grade. race Race/ethnicity. Enrollment race/ethnicity available across grades years since 2020. "" used data prior 2020. date_created Date record created. lss_number Local school system (LSS) number integer. NA used place LSS number statewide data. Older LEA numbers combined LSS numbers dataset. lss_name Local school system (LSS) names (typically county name). "State" used place LSS name statewide data. Older LEA names combined LSS names dataset.

title: Maryland Public School Enrollment (SY 2003-2022) — msde_enrollment

title: mapmaryland (development version)

title: mapmaryland 0.2.0
text: Update md_imap_index md_arcgis_index reference data (2023-08-22) Add cache_imap_data() function (2023-08-22) Add md_house_districts_2022 md_senate_districts_2022 (2022-07-05) md_zcta data (2022-10-26) Update msde_enrollment md_schools data (2023-02-10) Minor updates/fixes get_md_crash_data(), format_md_crash_data(), get_imap_data()

title: mapmaryland 0.1.0.9000 (2022-06-13)
text: refactor: set location default NULL allow get_imap_data() work w/ location feat: add msde_enrollment data frame md_schools simple features data frame refactor: limit set_mapmaryland_options() support crs parameter refactor: add null.ok parameter type2nm feat: export md_census_places + remove md_senate_districts refactor: add server_type column md_imap_index fix: transform md_census_places 3857 refactor: add countyfp county column md_census_places refactor: replace get_md_boundary w/ get_md_tigris() feat: add support data sources including sources downloaded w/ tigris package feat: add CRS support get_md_tigris() erase_water option feat: add format_md_sf() function feat: add datasets tigris feat: add us_states_near_md data feat: add get_imap_data function test: consolidate tests get_imap_data related functions feat: add get_cama_data() get_parcel_data() (using Maryland iMap data) test: add tests get_cama_data() get_parcel_data() refactor: add overedge dependency feat: update md_arcgis_index ensure consistency service_url data
